channel.title: Certain ares unable to tele/use commands
channel.description: how do i make it so in a certain area you cannot use any emotes or commands to teleport out

item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

[quote=“ownage plz, post:2, topic:119269”]under case 155 add if (NPCID == ####) { addItem(####, #); }

change the first #'s to the npc’s id and the additem #'s to the item number and the second one to the amount[/quote]OMG! that has nothing to do whit teleporting…-.-

item.title: Certain ares unable to tele/use commands
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Make a thing where if they haven’t completed tutorial island yet, it’ll make all of the emotes black, and not work. I have that for a Mini Quest. So they can’t do the emote until they’ve completed the quest.

Read full topic

item.title: Certain ares unable to tele/use commands
item.dc:creator: @ancientday ancientday
item.description:
@ancientday wrote:

well i did mine like this havnt tryed it out yet but i think it works

case 169: //train tele if(emotes == 0) if(!teleblock) { teleportToX = 2551; teleportToY = 3327; } else { emotes = 0; pEmote = playerSE; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if(teleblock) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } break;

edit wrong post but it works

item.title: Certain ares unable to tele/use commands
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Make an if statement, idk where, you’ll have to find that out… Such as:

if (playerIsInArea = XXXX, YYYY, XXXX, YYYY) { teleBlocked = true; sendMessage("You cannot teleport out of here"); }

Idk if that would work. You would have to change the if statement to your if player is in area thing…
